Bag of Winds

miscellaneous (lvl 4)

item id [id]: 303
magic bonus [boosters]: +A
start battle spell [startbattlespell]: #729 Summon Lesser Air Elemental
leadership (magic) [ldr-m]: +1

Requires 40A to forge (A5)

An entire storm is trapped inside this bag. When used by an Air mage, the bag will ease the casting of Air spells. Anyone holding the bag can release and command one small air elemental at the start of each battle.
